text: 19.18: Kis 20.13-16 naŋga, Lo 5.17-20Kamavahi kru kandɨhama Jisasɨŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumi, Tɨkatɨka kuyu pamatarɨm ambana, vami. Kamavahi Jisas ambami, Tɨkatɨka kuyu kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋɨndu kuyu nɨmata kɨndi. Krunavundiŋ mayɨvutatama. Kru na, navundi mamɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨ, naŋga navundi na, kru mamɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨ. Kipa mamɨŋa, kru muŋɨnɨŋ kuyusɨhɨrata saŋɨnaŋga maŋgatɨŋguru.
